name: Cho%27pa%27ailor
content:
Cho'pa'ailor, also known as Chopper, was a Besalisk male who worked for the Pyke Syndicate during the reign of the Galactic Empire.
Cho'pa'ailor operated a speeder repair shop in Quadrant L-42 of the Coruscant undercity. During the Galactic Civil War, a group of Pyke Syndicate operatives stole some encoded data regarding the identity of a bounty hunter who had betrayed the Syndicate and they passed the data on to Cho'pa'ailor, who decrypted the information and identified the bounty hunter as the Nikto Kaa'to Leeachos. The Besalisk then proceeded to commission the operatives to hunt down Leeachos on behalf of the Syndicate.
